stim.Description: Displayed Stimulus (or [response] for button press). Note that probes are displayed in uppercase

trial_number.LongName: Sequential position of the trial in the run

trial_structure.Description: whether the sequence is structured (phrase) or not (list)

trial_length.Description: number of actual words in the sequence (1 to 4)

sequential_position.Description: position of the current stimulus in the stream

probe_type.Description: whether the probe belongs to the previous sequence

probe_position.Description: sequential position of the probe item in the previous sequence (-1 if not present)

response_correct.Description: whether the subject pressed the correct response key

response_key.Description: code of the response key pressed by the participants

response_time.Description: response times since the onset of display of the probe
